job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen, uitbreiden en verbeteren van (virtuele) ETL jobs en data modellen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development and improvement of ETL jobs and data models, which are core components of building data pipelines and software systems.
This phrase directly refers to the design and realization of data preparations, which is a key responsibility within Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: complexe data extracten, transformaties en preparatie processen
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core activities of data engineering, involving extraction, transformation, and preparation of data.
The initial sentence mentions transformation to a digital and data-driven insurance provider, indicating an understanding of business goals.
This phrase describes the business domain and its data-driven nature, showing alignment with business context.

job_tasks.phrase: dataproducten leveren die direct waarde toevoegen voor onze klanten en collega's
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the focus on delivering value to customers and colleagues, a key business objective.

job_tasks.phrase: organisatie breed over hoe we data en AI technologie zo optimaal mogelijk kunnen integreren in ons landschap
job_tasks.justification: This describes advising across the organization on integrating data and AI technologies, which requires business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: richting geven aan de verdere implementatie van onze strategie op basis van o.a. de data productvisie, de kaders en principes van data architectuur als ook de brede Enterprise architectuur
job_tasks.justification: This involves shaping strategy based on data product vision and architecture principles, clearly indicating business alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Afstemmen met stakeholders en zo zeker stellen dat onze data producten ook aansluiten binnen de architectuur van ons moederbedrijf
job_tasks.justification: Aligning with stakeholders and ensuring data products fit within the parent company's architecture demonstrates business and stakeholder management.
Directly mentions data models as something to develop and improve.
Thinking up data solutions implies conceptualizing and potentially designing models.
Mentions ML Engineers who are involved in modeling, implying collaboration or understanding of their work.

soft_skills.phrase: werken nauw samen met de Data Engineers
Samen met de AAV Enterprise Architect richting geven
initiatief en de verantwoordelijkheid te nemen in het continu verbeteren

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes data engineering tasks such as developing ETL jobs, data models, and data preparation processes. While AI is mentioned in the context of integration, the core responsibilities and technologies point towards a strong Data Engineering focus, aligning with the 'ML Engineer' profile's overlap with data-centric roles.
